video.title: The Chicago Code
video.synopsis: Chicago's new police superintendant and her former partner battle to rid the city of crime and the rampant corruption of a powerful politico.

episodes.synopsis: Superintendent Teresa Colvin lobbies for a city corruption task force to investigate Alderman Ronin Gibbons, a building-magnate-turned-politician.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and Jarek vow to bring a cop killer to justice, while Gibbons visits the victim's family to offer his condolences and plant seeds of betrayal.
episodes.title: Hog Butcher

episodes.synopsis: Jarek and Caleb chase a thief. Meanwhile, duplicitous politicking raises the stakes and further exposes the depth of corruption in the city.
episodes.title: Gillis Chase & Babyface

episodes.synopsis: After a bomber blows up a city building, additional targets and innocent people remain in danger. Lives hang in the balance in a race against time.
episodes.title: Cabrini-Green

episodes.synopsis: After a teenager is murdered while spreading the word of his church in Chinatown, the detectives enlist Colvin to gain the cooperation of locals.
episodes.title: O'Leary's Cow

episodes.synopsis: When Superintendent Colvin calls upon detectives Wysocki and Evers to locate a drug supplier, they uncover a more elaborate murder case.
episodes.title: The Gold Coin Kid

episodes.synopsis: Wysocki and Evers investigate an international drug dealer whose family is in jeopardy. An FBI agent intervenes, complicating the high-profile case.
episodes.title: Blackhand & the Shotgun Man

episodes.synopsis: The summer heat and the likelihood of blackouts send the Chicago police into the streets in full force to temper the city's escalating violence.
episodes.title: Wild Onions

episodes.synopsis: When five merchants are killed in a restaurant in Lincoln Park, evidence points to an incarcerated gang leader from the impoverished neighborhood.
episodes.title: St. Valentine's Massacre

episodes.synopsis: While Teresa and Jarek set the stage for their case against Alderman Gibbons, their effort to clean up Chicago takes an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Bathouse and Hinky Dink

episodes.synopsis: Following a hate crime, Teresa risks tipping Gibbons off to her plan by boldly taking on the Chicago Police Department's corrupt promotion system.
episodes.title: Black Sox

episodes.synopsis: The case against Alderman Gibbons escalates, and Teresa, Jarek and Caleb scramble to locate a star witness.
episodes.title: Greylord & Gambat

episodes.synopsis: FBI Special Agent Cuyler returns to pay Superintendent Colvin a visit, and Jarek addresses the family issues that have haunted him for years.
episodes.title: Mike Royko's Revenge
